name: Penguin Passing
description:
Penguin Passing is a top-down 2D puzzle game about collecting clothing and becoming the most fashionable penguin. Use special tiles, rotate platforms, and race to the finish, but watch out for obstacles!

Credits
Daniel Zheng
Zach Dembinski
Daniel Zhang
Lukas Hazen-Bushbaker

Madison Lee (Voice Actress)
Justine Qiu (Music)
Jared Matheson (Background Art)

How to Download

Windows: Download the zip file and extract it. Inside the extracted folder will be the file "P3_Pengiun.exe". Double-click it and enjoy the game :)

Mac: Download the zip file and unzip it. Then right click on the app and click "open", you will be prompted with a message that the app "can't be opened because Apple cannot check it for malicious software". Press ok, right click on the app, and click "open" again. You will be prompted with another message, click the button with the text "open" and enjoy the game!
